name: Narcolepsy (EmperorEnema)
description:
You've always been afraid of falling asleep at night. What awaits you are not dreams and nightmares, but the endless annals of your house, and Him. You must wake up, or never open your eyes again.

In Narcolepsy, a 2D stealth horror, you must shake yourself from sleep by creating noise, using objects within the environment, all whilst evading the strange entity skulking the halls and rooms of your home.
